I am crawling a list of seed urls with a depth of 5. However, the seed repo=
rt file has not been changed for five days. Although the size of the crawle=
d document is increasing, the number of seed urls that are not crawled does=
 not decrease. I suspect the crawler might be "trapped" into a website so I=
 want the crawler to stop crawling the current seed urls and simply start c=
rawling the remaining seed URLs. How can I do that? I am using H3.1.0. Than=
ks. -John
